verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H8050><s%> unto Samuel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long מָתַי֙ <S%H4970><s%> How אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> will you מִתְאַבֵּ֣ל <S%H56><s%> How long wilt thou mourn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> for Saul וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I מְאַסְתִּ֔יו <S%H3988><s%> seeing I have rejected מִמְּלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> him from reigning עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מַלֵּ֨א <S%H4390><s%> accomplish קַרְנְךָ֜ <S%H7161><s%> thine horn שֶׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil וְלֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and go אֶֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֙ <S%H7971><s%> I will send אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over יִשַׁ֣י <S%H3448><s%> thee to Jesse בֵּֽית־ הַלַּחְמִ֔י <S%H1022><s%> the Bethlehemite כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רָאִ֧יתִי <S%H7200><s%> for I have provided בְּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> among his sons לִ֖י מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> me a king

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֵ֣יךְ <S%H349><s%> How אֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> along וְשָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> hear שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> ? if Saul וַהֲרָגָ֑נִי <S%H2026><s%> [it] he will kill ס וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> me And the LORD עֶגְלַ֤ת <S%H5697><s%> A heifer בָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> bull תִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> Take בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> with thee וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> and say לִזְבֹּ֥חַ <S%H2076><s%> to sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD בָּֽאתִי׃ <S%H935><s%> I am come

וְקָרָ֥אתָ <S%H7121><s%> And call לְיִשַׁ֖י <S%H3448><s%> Jesse בַּזָּ֑בַח <S%H2077><s%> to the sacrifice וְאָֽנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> and I אוֹדִֽיעֲךָ֙ <S%H3045><s%> and I will shew אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> thee what thou shalt do וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֣ <S%H4886><s%> and thou shalt anoint לִ֔י אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> unto me [him] whom I name אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that which the LORD וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came בֵּ֣ית לָ֑חֶם <S%H1035><s%> to Bethlehem וַיֶּחֶרְד֞וּ <S%H2729><s%> trembled זִקְנֵ֤י <S%H2205><s%> And the elders הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> of the town לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <S%H7122><s%> to meet וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said שָׁלֹ֥ם <S%H7965><s%> favor בּוֹאֶֽךָ׃ <S%H935><s%> Comest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> And he said שָׁל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Peaceably לִזְבֹּ֤חַ <S%H2076><s%> to sacrifice לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בָּ֔אתִי <S%H935><s%> I am come הִֽתְקַדְּשׁ֔וּ <S%H6942><s%> sanctify וּבָאתֶ֥ם <S%H935><s%> yourselves and come אִתִּ֖י <S%H854><s%> for בַּזָּ֑בַח <S%H2077><s%> with me to the sacrifice וַיְקַדֵּ֤שׁ <S%H6942><s%> And he sanctified אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשַׁי֙ <S%H3448><s%> Jesse וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and called לָהֶ֖ם לַזָּֽבַח׃ <S%H2077><s%> them to the sacrifice

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become בְּבוֹאָ֔ם <S%H935><s%> And it came to pass when they were come וַיַּ֖רְא <S%H7200><s%> that he looked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלִיאָ֑ב <S%H446><s%> on Eliab וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אַ֛ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> is before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Surely the LORD'S מְשִׁיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H4899><s%> anointed

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> But the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H8050><s%> unto Samuel אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּבֵּ֧ט <S%H5027><s%> Look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at מַרְאֵ֛הוּ <S%H4758><s%> not on his countenance וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּבֹ֥הַּ <S%H1364><s%> or on the height קוֹמָת֖וֹ <S%H6967><s%> of his stature כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because מְאַסְתִּ֑יהוּ <S%H3988><s%> because I have refused כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after יִרְאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> seeth הָאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> him for [the LORD seeth] not as man כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because הָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> for man יִרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> looketh לַעֵינַ֔יִם <S%H5869><s%> on the outward appearance וַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD יִרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> looketh לַלֵּבָֽב׃ <S%H3824><s%> on the heart

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> called יִשַׁי֙ <S%H3448><s%> Then Jesse אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲבִ֣ינָדָ֔ב <S%H41><s%> Abinadab וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֖הוּ <S%H5674><s%> and made him pass לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> either בָּזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not בָחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> chosen יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Neither hath the LORD

וַיַּעֲבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> to pass by יִשַׁ֖י <S%H3448><s%> Then Jesse שַׁמָּ֑ה <S%H8048><s%> made Shammah וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> either בָּזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not בָחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> chosen יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Neither hath the LORD

וַיַּעֲבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> to pass יִשַׁ֛י <S%H3448><s%> Again Jesse שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> made seven בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִשַׁ֔י <S%H3448><s%> unto Jesse לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not בָחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> hath not chosen יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בָּאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִשַׁי֮ <S%H3448><s%> unto Jesse הֲתַ֣מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> Are here all הַנְּעָרִים֒ <S%H5288><s%> babe וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ע֚וֹד <S%H5750><s%> yet שָׁאַ֣ר <S%H7604><s%> There remaineth הַקָּטָ֔ן <S%H6996><s%> yet the youngest וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold רֹעֶ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> and behold he keepeth בַּצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> the sheep וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵ֤ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִשַׁי֙ <S%H3448><s%> unto Jesse שִׁלְחָ֣ה <S%H7971><s%> Send וְקָחֶ֔נּוּ <S%H3947><s%> and fetch כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> we will not נָסֹ֖ב <S%H5437><s%> him for we will not sit down עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּא֥וֹ <S%H935><s%> till he come פֹֽה׃ <S%H6311><s%> hither

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> And he sent וַיְבִיאֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and brought him in וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> now he אַדְמוֹנִ֔י <S%H132><s%> Now he [was] ruddy עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> [and] withal יְפֵ֥ה <S%H3303><s%> of a beautiful עֵינַ֖יִם <S%H5869><s%> countenance וְט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and goodly רֹ֑אִי <S%H7210><s%> to look to פ וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise מְשָׁחֵ֖הוּ <S%H4886><s%> anoint כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> this הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took שְׁמוּאֵ֜ל <S%H8050><s%> Then Samuel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֶ֣רֶן <S%H7161><s%> the horn הַשֶּׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil וַיִּמְשַׁ֣ח <S%H4886><s%> and anointed אֹתוֹ֮ <S%H853><s%> בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> him in the midst אֶחָיו֒ <S%H251><s%> of his brethren וַתִּצְלַ֤ח <S%H6743><s%> came רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> and the Spirit יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> upon דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> upon David מֵהַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> from that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וָמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> forward וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> So Samuel וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went הָרָמָֽתָה׃ <S%H7414><s%> to Ramah ס

וְר֧וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> But the Spirit יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD סָ֖רָה <S%H5493><s%> departed מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> from שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> from Saul וּבִֽעֲתַ֥תּוּ <S%H1204><s%> troubled רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> spirit רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> and an evil מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> said עַבְדֵֽי־ <S%H5650><s%> servants שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul's אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֧א <S%H4994><s%> now רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> spirit אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> from God רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> unto him Behold now an evil מְבַעִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H1204><s%> troubleth

יֹאמַר־ <S%H559><s%> now command נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now אֲדֹנֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H113><s%> Let our lord עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servants לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> [which are] before יְבַקְשׁ֕וּ <S%H1245><s%> thee to seek out אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man יֹדֵ֖עַ <S%H3045><s%> [who is] a cunning מְנַגֵּ֣ן <S%H5059><s%> player בַּכִּנּ֑וֹר <S%H3658><s%> on an harp וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come בִּֽהְי֨וֹת <S%H1961><s%> shall come עָלֶ֤יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> spirit אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> from God רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> and it shall come to pass when the evil וְנִגֵּ֥ן <S%H5059><s%> is upon thee that he shall play בְּיָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> with his hand וְט֥וֹב <S%H2895><s%> and thou shalt be well לָֽךְ׃ פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עֲבָדָ֑יו <S%H5650><s%> unto his servants רְאוּ־ <S%H7200><s%> Provide נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now לִ֗י אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> me now a man מֵיטִ֣יב <S%H3190><s%> well לְנַגֵּ֔ן <S%H5059><s%> that can play וַהֲבִיאוֹתֶ֖ם <S%H935><s%> and bring אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> then

וַיַּעַן֩ <S%H6030><s%> Then answered אֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> one מֵהַנְּעָרִ֜ים <S%H5288><s%> of the servants וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold רָאִ֜יתִי <S%H7200><s%> Behold I have seen בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> a son לְיִשַׁי֮ <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse בֵּ֣ית הַלַּחְמִי֒ <S%H1022><s%> the Bethlehemite יֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> [that is] cunning נַ֠גֵּן <S%H5059><s%> in playing וְגִבּ֨וֹר <S%H1368><s%> and a mighty חַ֜יִל <S%H2428><s%> valiant man וְאִ֧ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and a man מִלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> of war וּנְב֥וֹן <S%H995><s%> and prudent דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> in matters וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> person תֹּ֑אַר <S%H8389><s%> and a comely וַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with
